Reviews.Title: Little light blue spot in the middle of the screen
Reviews.Author: S. Livermore
Reviews.Content: This TV does exactly what it was advertised to do.  It's very nice, versatile and pretty.  But the one they sent me, needs to be returned.  It has a little light blue spot in the middle of the screen that is very noticeable when watching movies.  When purchasing items, especially this big and expensive via internet, the quandary becomes.. is it worth paying the shipping, to have it sent back and hopefully get one that's better in return...

Reviews.Title: GPX
Reviews.Author: deb
Reviews.Content: This is a great little tv for my grand kids. Reasonably priced with the extra DVD feature. The kids are loving it.

Reviews.Title: Review
Reviews.Author: sarah hunt
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 4-year old grand daughter. She is able to operate it on her own. When she want to watch a movie she just choose one put it in and watch. I don't have to do anything it free me up.
